Sentence B: midsize prismlike orange iron snorkeling knife
Adjective order: Size (midsize) > Shape (prismlike) > Color (orange) > Material (iron) > Purpose (snorkeling)

Step 4: Compare the adjective orders to the correct order.

Sentence A: The adjective order is not correct, as it does not follow the standard order of adjectives.

Sentence B: The adjective order is correct, as it follows the standard order of adjectives.

Step 5: Provide the final answer.

The correct adjective order is in sentence B: midsize prismlike orange iron snorkeling knife.

The answer is: The correct adjective order is in sentence B: midsize prismlike orange iron snorkeling knife.
